content.question: Assume that a country has limited reserves in its banking system. Which of the following would lead to inflation in the long run according to the quantity theory of money?

choices.label: Sustained purchases of government bonds by the central bank
Consumers spending more money as their confidence grows
An increase in the federal budget surplus
Business taxes decreasing and firms spending more money on capital improvements

content.answer: Sustained purchases of government bonds by the central bank
